name: Home Sweet Home (itch) (Zoglu)
description:
Home Sweet Home is a sweet game about dolce vita !

Enjoy every meal of your day, explore your neighborhood, and meet lots of friendly and generous people !

Just try to keep fit, stay in comfortable and warm places, and remember to sleep during nights. Nothing to be alarmed here. The rest is just pleasure !
The best part : you will be paid for this !
Then, you will be so glad to get home and enjoy your easy-made revenue.

So, what are you waiting for ? Start this wonderful adventure !
